description: Add sleek style to your bedroom and enjoy crystal-clear sound with the Phillips Fidelio DS1210 Speaker Dock. This compact unit delivers rich, full sound and automatically synchronizes with your iPhone/iPod's clock settings. Ideal for a bedroom, the DS1210 tells time, wakes you up, works as a nightlight, and includes a usb charging port for a second device or accessory. It also offers shielding technology to guard against mobile phone interference.
title: Philips Speaker Dock for iPod/iPhone/iPad DS1210/37
